welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Naples, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that this city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naples Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Naples Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Immokalee Airport handles all incoming and outgoing flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Immokalee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Page Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Page Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
